A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars needed to renew itself\, break the wheel if you will\, and that's what they've done. Our heroes aren't Mary Sues who make perfect choices. They are older and flawed\, weary and dispirited. I commend Rian Johnson for making some bold choices about character development\, and avoiding falling into the trap of making an Empire 2.0. Just like the criticism Empire faced upon release\, this film will be remembered more fondly in the future.
